frame.name: The Corruption Spreads
frame.description: This weapon creates SIVA nanite swarms on rapid hits and precision kills.

perks.description:
Weighty barrel extension.
  •  Increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed
  •  Moderately controls recoil
perks.name: Extended Barrel

perks.description:
This weapon can fire longer distances.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Accurized Rounds

perks.description: Precision kills greatly decrease reload time.
perks.name: Outlaw

perks.description: This weapon does more damage to enemies based on the number of SIVA nanites that attach to them.
perks.name: Parasitism
